Package com.att.research.xacml.api

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Advice
    Defines the API for objects that implement XACML 3.0 AssociatedAdvice elements.
    Attribute
    Defines the API for objects that represent XACML 3.0 Attribute elements.
    AttributeAssignment
    Defines the API for objects that represent XACML 3.0 AttributeAssignment elements.
    AttributeCategory
    Defines the API for objects representing XACML Attributes elements.
    AttributeValue<T>
    Defines the API for objects representing XACML AttributeValue elements.
    DataType<T>
    Defines the API for objects that represent XACML 3.0 data types.
    Identifier
    Identifier is the interface for objects that represent a XACML 3.0 identifier.
    IdReference
    Defines the API for objects that implement XACML reference elements PolicyIdReference and PolicySetIdReference.
    IdReferenceMatch
    Defines the API for objects that represent XACML PolicyIdReference or PolicySetIdReference elements with exact, earliest, and latest version matching.
    MissingAttributeDetail
    Defines the API for objects that represent XACML MissingAtributeDetail elements as part of a Status element.
    Obligation
    Defines the API for objects that represent XACML Obligation elements.
    Request
    Provides the API for objects that represent XACML Request elements.
    RequestAttributes
    Defines the API for objects that represent XACML 3.0 Attributes elements within a Request by extending the AttributeCategory interface with methods for accessing DOM Nodes representing XACML 3.0 Content elements.
    RequestAttributesReference
    Defines the API for objects that implement XACML AttributesReference elements.
    RequestDefaults
    Defines the API for objects that represent XACML RequestDefaults elements.
    RequestReference
    Defines the API for objects that represent XACML RequestReference elements.
    Response
    Defines the API for objects that represent XACML Response documents.
    Result
    Defines the API for objects that represent XACML Result elements.
    SemanticString
    SemanticString is an interface for objects that have semantically significant String representations.
    Status
    Defines the API for objects that represent XACML Status elements.
    StatusCode
    Defines the API for objects that represent XACML StatusCode values.
    StatusDetail
    Defines the API for objects that represent XACML StatusDetail elements.
    Version
    Version is the interface that objects that represent XACML VersionType attributes and elements implement.
    VersionMatch
    VersionMatch is the interface that objects implementing references to Version objects must implement.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DataTypeFactory
    Abstract class for mapping data type Identifiers to DataType objects.
    XACML
    XACML defines a number of constants useful in processing XACML documents.
    XACML1
    XACML1 contains the constants (Strings, URIs Identifiers that are defined in the XACML 1.0 Specification: "OASIS Standard 1.0, 18 February 2003 OASIS Standard as of 6 Feb.
    XACML2
    XACML2 contains the constants (Strings, URIs Identifiers that are defined in the XACML 2.0 Specification: "XACML 2.0 Core: eXtensible Access Control Markup Language (XACML) Version 2.0".
    XACML3
    XACML3 contains the constants (Strings, URIs Identifiers that are defined in the XACML 2.0 Specification: "eXtensible Access Control Markup Language (XACML) Version 3.0".
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Decision
    Enumeration of the XACML 3.0 decisions and extended decisions that can be returned as part of a Result.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    DataTypeException
    Extends Exception to represent errors thrown by methods in the DataType interface.
